title: An account of the Scotish atlas, or, The description of Scotland ancient & modern by His Sacred Majestie's special command to be published presently by Sir Robert Sibbald D.M. His Majestie's physician in ordinary, and geographer for his ancient kingdom of Scotland.
author: Sibbald, Robert, Sir, 1641-1722.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by David Lindsay, Mr. James Kniblo, Josua van Solingen, and John Colmar,
